00008         try
00009         {
00010                 x = new X3D(Scene(), x3dVersion::cxx_3_0, profileNames::Immersive);
00011         }

00023 void X3DDriver::LoadX3D(CString fileName) {
00024   try
00025   {
00026         map["X3D"].name = "http://www.web3d.org/x3d/specifications";
00027         map["X3D"].schema = "http://www.web3d.org/x3d/specifications/x3d-3.0.xsd";
00028     // Deserialize from file
00029         //std:auto_ptr<X3D> x_a(X3D_((LPCTSTR)fileName, xml_schema::flags::dont_validate));
00030         //x_a->
00031   }
00032   catch (const xml_schema::exception& e)
00033   {
00034         AfxMessageBox("Failed to de-serialize from X3D file!");
00035     return;
00036   }
00037 }
00038 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 void X3DDriver::SaveX3D(CString fileName) {
00040         // Serialize into file
00041         using namespace xercesc;
00042         XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize ();
00043         try
00044         {
00045                 //map[""].name = "x3d";
00046                 map["X3D"].name = "http://www.web3d.org/x3d/specifications";
00047                 map["X3D"].schema = "http://www.web3d.org/x3d/specifications/x3d-3.0.xsd";
00048                 std::auto_ptr<XMLFormatTarget> ft;
00049                 ft = std::auto_ptr<XMLFormatTarget> (new LocalFileFormatTarget ((LPCTSTR)fileName));
00050                 X3D_(*ft, *x, map);
00051         }
00052         catch (const xml_schema::exception& e)
00053         {
00054                 AfxMessageBox("Failed to serialize to X3D file!");
00055                 return;
00056         }
00057         XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate ();
00058 }
00059 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 void X3DDriver::AddObstacle(int id, CString center, CString size, CString label) {
00061         Scene::Transform::container &tc = x->Scene().Transform();
00062         Transform tr;
00063 
00064         // --- Add box
00065         CString sID; sID.Format("obstacle%d", id);
00066         tr.DEF() = (LPCTSTR)sID;
00067         //tr.center() = SFVec3f((LPCTSTR)center);
00068         tr.translation() = SFVec3f((LPCTSTR)center);
00069         Shape s;
00070         Box box;
00071         Appearance a;
00072         Material m;
00073         m.ambientIntensity() = SFFloat(0.2f); 
00074         m.shininess() = SFFloat(0.2f);
00075         m.transparency() = SFFloat(0.5f);
00076         m.diffuseColor() = SFVec3f("1 1 0");
00077         m.emissiveColor() = SFVec3f("0 0 0.3");
00078         m.specularColor() = SFVec3f("0 0 0");
00079         a.Material().push_back(m);
00080         s.Appearance(a);
00081         box.size() = SFVec3f((LPCTSTR)size);
00082         s.Box(box);
00083         tr.Shape().push_back(s);
00084         tc.push_back(tr);
00085 }

00087 void X3DDriver::AddTrack( int id, CString urlAvatar, CString coords, CString times, CString orients, CString otimes, CString tcoords, CString ttimes)
00088 {
00089         double height = 170, radius = 30;
00090         Scene::Transform::container &tc = x->Scene().Transform();
00091         Transform tr;
00092         CString sID; sID.Format("id%d", id);
00093         tr.DEF() = (LPCTSTR)sID;
00094         tr.scale() = SFVec3f("70 70 70");
00095         tr.rotation() = SFRotation("0 0 1 0");
00096         tr.center() = SFVec3f("0 0 0"); 
00097 
00098         // --- Add avatar transform
00099         Transform sub1;
00100         Inline c;
00101         MFString mfurl;
00102         mfurl.push_back((LPCTSTR)urlAvatar);
00103         c.url() = mfurl;
00104         sub1.Inline().push_back(c);
00105         sub1.rotation() = SFRotation("1 0 0 1.7");
00106         Group gr;
00107         gr.Transform().push_back(sub1);
00108 
00109 
00110         // --- Add id text
00111         Transform sub2;
00112         sub2.translation() = SFVec3f("-0.2 0.3 0.2");
00113         sub2.rotation() = SFRotation("1 0 0 1.7");
00114         Text txt;
00115         Shape s;
00116         MFString idMFS;
00117         CString textID; textID.Format("%d", id);
00118         idMFS.push_back((LPCTSTR)textID);
00119         txt.string(idMFS);
00120         txt.solid() = false;
00121         FontStyle fs; //fs.size() = 2;
00122         txt.FontStyle(fs);
00123         s.Text(txt);
00124         Appearance a;
00125         Material m;
00126         m.ambientIntensity() = SFFloat(1); 
00127         m.shininess() = SFFloat(1);
00128         m.transparency() = SFFloat(0.0);
00129         m.diffuseColor() = SFVec3f("0 1 0");
00130         m.emissiveColor() = SFVec3f("0 0 0.3");
00131         m.specularColor() = SFVec3f("0 0 0");
00132         a.Material().push_back(m);
00133         s.Appearance(a);
00134         sub2.Shape().push_back(s);
00135         gr.Transform().push_back(sub2);
00136         tr.Group().push_back(gr);
00137 
00138 
00139         /*<Transform DEF='MYTRANS' translation="-0.2 0 0">
00140         <Shape>
00141         <Appearance>
00142         <Material ambientIntensity='1' diffuseColor='0 1 0'/>
00143         </Appearance>
00144         <Text DEF='MYTEXT' string='3'>
00145         <FontStyle DEF='MYFONT' style='BOLD'/>
00146         </Text>
00147         </Shape>
00148         </Transform>*/
00149 
00150         // --- Add position interpolator
00151         PositionInterpolator pi;
00152         pi.DEF() = (LPCTSTR)(sID+"_pi");
00153         pi.key() = MFFloat((LPCTSTR)times);
00154         pi.keyValue() = MFVec3f((LPCTSTR)coords);
00155         tr.PositionInterpolator().push_back(pi);
00156 
00157         // --- Add orientation interpolator
00158         OrientationInterpolator oi;
00159         oi.DEF() = (LPCTSTR)(sID+"_oi");
00160         oi.key() = MFFloat((LPCTSTR)times);
00161         oi.keyValue() = MFVec3f((LPCTSTR)orients);
00162         tr.OrientationInterpolator().push_back(oi);
00163 
00164         // --- Add visibility sequences
00165         IntegerSequencer viz;
00166         viz.DEF() = (LPCTSTR)(sID+"_viz");
00167         viz.key() = MFFloat((LPCTSTR)ttimes);
00168         viz.keyValue() = MFVec3f((LPCTSTR)tcoords);
00169         tr.IntegerSequencer().push_back(viz);
00170 
00171         // --- Route events
00172         ROUTE r1((LPCTSTR)("myTimeSensor"), "fraction_changed", (LPCTSTR)(sID+"_pi"), "set_fraction");
00173         ROUTE r2((LPCTSTR)(sID+"_pi"), "value_changed", (LPCTSTR)sID, "set_translation");
00174         ROUTE o1((LPCTSTR)("myTimeSensor"), "fraction_changed", (LPCTSTR)(sID+"_oi"), "set_fraction");
00175         ROUTE o2((LPCTSTR)(sID+"_oi"), "value_changed", (LPCTSTR)sID, "set_rotation");
00176         ROUTE v1((LPCTSTR)("myTimeSensor"), "fraction_changed", (LPCTSTR)(sID+"_viz"), "set_fraction");
00177         ROUTE v2((LPCTSTR)(sID+"_viz"), "value_changed", (LPCTSTR)(sID+"_switch"), "set_whichChoice");
00178 
00179         tr.ROUTE().push_back(r1);
00180         tr.ROUTE().push_back(r2);
00181         tr.ROUTE().push_back(o1);
00182         tr.ROUTE().push_back(o2);
00183         tr.ROUTE().push_back(v1);
00184         tr.ROUTE().push_back(v2);
00185 
00186         // Add visibility switch
00187         Transform tr2;
00188         Switch sw2;
00189         sw2.DEF() = (LPCTSTR)(sID+"_switch");
00190         sw2.Transform().push_back(tr);
00191         tr2.Switch().push_back(sw2);
00192         tr2.translation() = SFVec3f("0 0 120");
00193         tc.push_back(tr2);
00194 }
00195 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00196 void X3DDriver::AddTimeSensor(CString name, CString duration) { 
00197         // --- Add time sensor
00198         TimeSensor ts;
00199         ts.DEF() = (LPCTSTR)(name);
00200         ts.loop() = false;
00201         ts.cycleInterval() = SFTime((LPCTSTR)duration);
00202         x->Scene().TimeSensor().push_back(ts);
00203         // add touch sensor
00204         TouchSensor touch;
00205         touch.DEF() = (LPCTSTR)("touch");
00206         x->Scene().TouchSensor().push_back(touch);
00207         ROUTE r1("touch", "touchTime", (LPCTSTR)name, "set_startTime");
00208         x->Scene().ROUTE().push_back(r1);
00209 }
00210 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00211 void X3DDriver::ClearScene() {
00212         // --- Clear the scene
00213         x->Scene().Background().clear();
00214         x->Scene().Transform().clear();
00215         x->Scene().Shape().clear();
00216         x->Scene().Viewpoint().clear();
00217 }
00218 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00219 void X3DDriver::SetViewPoint() {
00221         Scene::Viewpoint::container &vc = x->Scene().Viewpoint();
00222         Viewpoint v;
00223         v.position() = SFVec3f("0 0 2000");
00224         vc.push_back(v);
00225         //<Viewpoint description="The World" orientation="0 1 0 1.57" position="10 0 0"/> 
00226 }
00227 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00228 void X3DDriver::AddFloorImage(CString imageFile, CString minmaxExt) {
00229         // --- Add Floor Plane
00230         Shape sh;
00231         Appearance a;
00232         IndexedFaceSet ifs;
00233         ImageTexture it;
00234         ifs.coordIndex() = MFInt32("0 1 2 3");
00235         ifs.texCoordIndex() = MFInt32("0 1 2 3");
00236         Coordinate co;
00237         co.point() = MFVec3f((LPCTSTR)minmaxExt);
00238         ifs.Coordinate() = co;
00239         TextureCoordinate tco;
00240         tco.point() = MFVec2f("0 1, 0 0, 1 0, 1 1");
00241         ifs.TextureCoordinate() = tco;
00242         MFString bgMFS; bgMFS.push_back((LPCTSTR)imageFile);
00243         it.url() = bgMFS;
00244         a.ImageTexture().push_back(it);
00245         sh.Appearance(a);
00246         sh.IndexedFaceSet() = ifs;
00247         x->Scene().Shape().push_back(sh);
00248 }
